item.title: Algorithm_Leetcode
item.description: 1. 两数之和 题目 https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/two-sum/ 解答 class Solution(object): def twoSum(self, nums, target): n=len(nums) for i in range(n): for j in range(i+1,n): if nums[i]+nums[j]==target: return i,j def twoSum(nums, target): hashmap={} for ind,num in enumerate(nums): hashmap[num] = ind for i,num in enumerate(nums): j = hashmap.get(target - num) if j is not None and i!=j: return [i,j]
